title: Computer Network Fundamentals: Customized Curriculum Through Adaptive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and digital competence
context.additional_context: Delivering foundational networking concepts to pre-service/in-service teachers at a level applicable to educational contexts

learning_goals: Compare and explain the composition principles and advantages/disadvantages of network topologies (star, mesh, ring, etc.)
Visually represent data transmission processes based on the OSI 7-layer model and TCP/IP model
Accurately perform personalized content (quizzes, simulations) tailored to individual comprehension levels using adaptive learning platforms with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
